noun.description: Each of a pair of hinged panels, often louvered, fixed inside or outside a window that can be closed for security or privacy or to keep out light.
A device that opens and closes to expose the film in a camera.
The blind enclosing the swell box in an organ, used for controlling the volume of sound.

verb.description: Close the shutters of (a window or building)
examples: the windows were shuttered against the afternoon heat
